alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 5:28PM CDT until June 11 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN POTTAWATTAMIE...SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON...SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTH CENTRAL DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bennington, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... northern Omaha and Standing Bear Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Iowa...and east central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
